body_html: @branquinhoaa I would say all users, since a user only becomes a coach when they have been assigned that role in a team in a year. Showing interest in something (coach, supervisor, …) should be regardless of whether or not one has previously assumed that role in RGSoC.
body_text: @branquinhoaa I would say all users, since a user only becomes a coach when they have been assigned that role in a team in a year. Showing interest in something (coach, supervisor, …) should be regardless of whether or not one has previously assumed that role in RGSoC.
body: @branquinhoaa I would say all users, since a user only becomes a coach when they have been assigned that role in a team in a year. Showing interest in something (coach, supervisor, …) should be regardless of whether or not one has previously assumed that role in RGSoC.
